text: wja' qwm lut ysrewn almshy 'iilayh litalab alfahsht, wakanuu min qabl mjyyhm yatun alrijal shahwatan dun alnsa', faqal lut lqwmh: hwla' banati tazawwajwhn fhnn 'athar lakum mimaa trydwn, wsmahn bnath; li'ana nabiin al'umat bmnzlt alab lhm, fakhshu allah wahdharuu eqabh, wala tfdhwny bialaietida' ealaa dyfy, 'alays minkum rajul dhu rshd, ynha man 'arad rukub alfahsht, fyhwl baynahum wabayn dhlk?
